Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.stressapp.stressapp_test

import logging


from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.host import Host
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.stressapp_runner import StressappRunner



[docs]class StressappTest(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(StressappTest, self).__init__()
        self.user_args = self.test_control.get("user_args", None)



[docs]    def setup(self):
        super(StressappTest, self).setup()
        self.stress_app = StressappRunner(self.host, self.user_args)
        self.validate_no_exception(self.stress_app.test_setup, [], "Stressapp setup()")



[docs]    def execute(self):

        self.validate_no_exception(
            self.stress_app.start_test, [], "Stressapp startup()"
        )
        self.validate_no_exception(
            self.stress_app.parse_results, [], "Stressapp parse_results()"
        )

        logging.info("stressapptest completed successfully")



[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        super(StressappTest, self).cleanup()




[docs]def main():
    test = StressappTest()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
